thread.title: 35 Mini Resolutions You Should Try in 2017
thread.title_full: 35 Mini Resolutions You Should Try in 2017

author: Macy Williams
title: 35 Mini Resolutions You Should Try in 2017
text:
Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 35 Mini Resolutions You Should Try in 2017 
New Year's resolutions often seem unrealistic and impossible to complete. So why not go small this year? We have 35 ideas for mini resolutions that are attainable and productive. You'll still feel good about completing a goal without all that unnecessary stress! Give it a shot! Related:
